Deposit Description: Choose the appropriate method to top up USDT on the BNB chain
Deposit Warning: Target network is BNB (Chain). Incorrect transfers will result in asset loss.
Embedded Wallet Tips: This is your embedded wallet (no custodial) address on our platform:
Wallet Deposit Tips: You can directly transfer BNB Chain USDT to this address for deposit.
Deposit Method 1 Instructions: Instructions: Transfer USDT directly from an exchange or wallet to the address above.
Deposit Method 2 Instructions: Instructions: Use onramps to facilitate the transfer.
Deposit Method 3 Instructions: Instructions: Use a recommended third-party service to facilitate the transfer.
Deposit Declaration: This platform does not directly host third-party deposit portals. Please proceed with caution and verify transaction information.
Please enter an amount more than 10: Please enter an amount more than 10
Title: Title
Ttitle Prompt: Please fill in the topic title
Successful prompt: Your suggestion has been created successfully. Share it on social media to invite more users to support you
Suggested Rules: 1. The suggestions you submit will be published in the Suggestion Hall for all users to view. Other users can express their support through voting, and you can also share your suggestions on social media to invite friends to contribute
Consideration Rules: 2. Puzzle will comprehensively evaluate the feasibility of suggestions based on their validity, user voting results, and other relevant factors, and may adopt them as new market topics
Adopt Rules: 3. Once your suggestion is successfully adopted, you will receive a reward of [50] simulated TUIT tokens. You can view adopted topics and claim your reward by going to [Topic Voting] â†’ [My] page
Hide Rules: 4. If you are a special user of Puzzle (Broker Agent), your suggestions will receive higher priority in the adoption process. (Learn more about how to become a broker or agent)
Tuit Desc One: 1. Simulated TUIT is an off-chain virtual asset issued and managed by Puzzle Prediction Market, with no direct connection to blockchain. It cannot be transferred or queried on-chain.
Tuit Desc Tow: 2. The value of simulated TUIT is pegged to TUIT on the BNB chain at a 1:1 ratio.
Tuit Desc Three: 3. Simulated TUIT can be used to offset transaction fees and can be activated to on-chain TUIT when certain conditions are met.
Method One Desc: First-time login to Puzzle Prediction Market rewards you with 50 simulated TUIT. Simply click the [Invitation] link to view.
Method Tow Desc: Share your exclusive registration link to invite friends for their first login to Puzzle Prediction Market. Each successful referral rewards you with 10 simulated TUIT.
Method Three Desc: More reward activities will be launched periodically. Stay tuned!
Tuit Rules One Desc: In Puzzle Prediction Market, simulated TUIT can be used to offset transaction fees:
Tuit Rules One Desc a: a. 1 simulated TUIT = offset 0.1 USDT transaction fee.
Tuit Rules One Desc b: b. Offset priority: Inactivated simulated TUIT (priority to those nearing expiration) â†’ Activated simulated TUIT â†’ On-chain TUIT â†’ USDT.
Tuit Rules Tow Desc a: a. When users generate transaction fees in the market (without using TUIT for offset), the system will automatically activate corresponding simulated TUIT at a ratio of 1 USDT fee â†’ activate 1 simulated TUIT.
Tuit Rules Tow Desc b: b. Activated simulated TUIT remains permanently valid and does not expire.
Tuit Rules Three Desc a: a. Simulated TUIT obtained has a validity period of 30 days.
Tuit Rules Three Desc b: b. If not activated within 30 days, it will automatically expire at 00:00 (UTC+0) on the 31st day.
Tuit Rules Three Desc c: c. Activated simulated TUIT is not subject to validity period restrictions.
Tuit Rules Four Desc a: a. When activated simulated TUIT â‰¥ 100, users can click [] â†’ [Withdraw] to initiate the operation.
Tuit Rules Four Desc b: b. The system will deduct an equivalent amount of simulated TUIT and transfer the corresponding amount of on-chain TUIT to your wallet shortly.
